text: "What Went Down" is the first single by the British rock band Foals. It is the title track from their fourth studio album of the same name and was debuted and released 16 June 2015 via DJ Annie Mac's BBC Radio 1 show. == Track listing == == Charts == {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !Chart (2015) !Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Mexico Ingles Airplay (Billboard) | align="center"| 30 |- |- |- |- |} == Bandwidth remix == On 16 September 2015, a remix of "What Went Down" was released featuring remixing from Justin Chancellor (formerly with Peach and Death Grips) and Scott Kirkland of The Crystal Method. The single was released for streaming and digital download. == References == == External links == * Category:2015 singles Category:2015 songs Category:Foals songs Category:Transgressive Records singles Category:Warner Records singles Category:Songs written by Yannis Philippakis
title: What Went Down (song)
